text: Cast your vote because the People ’ s Choice Awards are coming and so many of our favorites are nominated! From TV shows and movies to music and pop culture : everyone from KJ Apa to Cameron Dallas is up for an award. Finding its home on a new network, the winners of the People ’ s Choice Awards are all completely chosen by the fans, so it ’ s kind of a big deal! As of today, voting is now open and fans can cast their votes up until the show airs on November 11th. Keep scrolling to check out the full list of nominations and see if some of your favorites made the cut! A post shared by People ’ s Choice ( @ peopleschoice ) on Mar 4, 2018 at 3 : 16pm PST MOVIES MOVIE OF 2018 “ Black Panther ” “
